medical_history.chief_complaint: Increased abdominal pain and pressure localized to the lower abdomen and periumbilical regions following outpatient ERCP.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Increased abdominal pain and pressure began after outpatient ERCP; patient also reports decreased drain output over the past week. No fevers, nausea, vomiting, constipation, or diarrhea were noted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Recurrent gallbladder adenocarcinoma, status post cholecystectomy and various resections primarily affecting the liver and pancreas.
